scripts.dev: node -e "console.log('ğŸ”§ Starting Backend Development Server...')" && nodemon src/server.ts
scripts.db:generate: node -e "console.log('âš™ï¸ Generating Prisma Client...')" && prisma generate
scripts.db:push: node -e "console.log('ğŸ“¤ Pushing database schema...')" && prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: node -e "console.log('ğŸ”„ Running database migrations...')" && prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:studio: node -e "console.log('ğŸ¨ Opening Prisma Studio...')" && prisma studio
scripts.db:reset: node -e "console.log('âš ï¸ Resetting database...')" && prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:seed:admin: node -e "console.log('ğŸ‘‘ Seeding Super Admin...')" && ts-node scripts/seedSuperAdmin.ts
scripts.db:seed:institution: node -e "console.log('ğŸŒ± Seeding institution data...')" && ts-node scripts/seedInstitutionData.ts
scripts.docker:logs: node -e "console.log('ğŸ“‹ Showing Docker logs...')" && docker-compose logs -f postgres-dev
scripts.docker:ps: node -e "console.log('ğŸ“Š Docker container status...')" && docker-compose ps
scripts.docker:dev: node -e "console.log('ğŸ³ Starting Docker Dev Environment...')" && docker-compose up postgres-dev
scripts.docker:prod: node -e "console.log('ğŸ³ Starting Docker Production Environment...')" && docker-compose --profile prod up postgres-prod
scripts.docker:dev:build: node -e "console.log('ğŸ³ Building and Starting Docker Dev Environment...')" && docker-compose up --build postgres-dev
scripts.docker:prod:build: node -e "console.log('ğŸ³ Building and Starting Docker Production Environment...')" && docker-compose --profile prod up --build postgres-prod
scripts.docker:down: node -e "console.log('ğŸ›‘ Stopping Docker containers...')" && docker-compose down
scripts.docker:down:volumes: node -e "console.log('ğŸ›‘ Stopping Docker containers and removing volumes...')" && docker-compose down -v
scripts.test: node -e "console.log('ğŸ§ª Running Backend Tests...')" && node -e "console.log('âš ï¸ No tests configured yet')" && exit 0
